title: Israeli hummus restaurant offers half-off discount for Arabs and Jews who eat together
text:
Israeli hummus restaurant offers half-off discount for Arabs and Jews who eat together 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Amid the recent outbreak of violence in Israel, one restaurant is seeking to bring peace by encouraging Arabs and Jews to break bread togeth...
